The left-handed banana is an unobtainable item added to the game with Tai Bwo Wannai Trio. It was added at the same time as the Sliced banana, in case any animation would require the player to wield a banana in their left hand. [1] However, the player holds the banana in their right hand while slicing it, and as a result the left-handed banana can never be seen ingame.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Unused left-handed banana animation

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 February 2015
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Banana left" to "Left-handed banana".
  • The item's value was decreased from 2 to 1.
  • The "Eat" option was removed.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 6 November 2018. (Archived from the original on 29 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "Used as a dummy item spliced into one's left hand for a banana-slicing animation, yes."

[[File:Left-handed banana detail.png|150x150px|left]]
The '''left-handed banana''' is an [[unobtainable item]] added to the game with [[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]]. It was added at the same time as the [[Sliced banana]], in case any animation would require the player to wield a [[banana]] in their left hand. {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1059610089672335360|date=6 November 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/q22au|archivedate=29 May 2020|quote=Used as a dummy item spliced into one's left hand for a banana-slicing animation, yes.}} However, the player holds the banana in their right hand while slicing it, and as a result the left-handed banana can never be seen ingame.

==Gallery==
<gallery captionalign="center" heights="330" widths="150">
Left-handed banana animation.gif|Unused left-handed banana animation
</gallery>

|update = The Grand Exchange

*The item's value was decreased from 2 to 1.
*The "Eat" option was removed.
}}
